snippet: Argentina's president has reasserted her country's claim to the Falkland Islands, or Islas Malvinas, in an open letter to the British prime minister. On both sides of the Atlantic, the dispute has a history of affecting domestic politics.
abstract: Argentina's president has reasserted her country's claim to the Falkland Islands, or Islas Malvinas, in an open letter to the British prime minister. On both sides of the Atlantic, the dispute has a history of affecting domestic politics.

headline.main: Skeptics See Hidden Agendas in Latest Anglo-Argentine Spat
